name: Blocky Balloons (for Playdate)
description:
Blocky Balloons is a block-pushing "sokoban-like" puzzle game. Push, slide, and undo your way through 40+ puzzles to get those balloons!　🎈🎈🎈

A free demo with the first 21 levels is available to download below. If you finish the demo, you'll find a cheat code to "transfer" your progress to the full version.

Features:
  • Autosaves, after every puzzle. A full playthrough can take 1.5~3+ hours, depending on your experience with puzzle games and how much you want to complete.
  • Goofy little cosmetics, unlockable through normal gameplay (no microtransactions, or megatransactions).
  • 8+ beepy boopy music tracks, which can be muted from the in-game settings menu. Soundtrack download (320 kbps .mp3 files) is available alongside the full game below.
How to load the game?

You can play the downloaded .pdx file in two ways:

  1. Sideload it to your physical Playdate console, either wirelessly or via USB cable. See the instructions here: https://help.play.date/games/sideloading/
  2. Open it in the Playdate Simulator app, part of the free Playdate SDK available for Windows, Mac, and Linux. Download the SDK here: https://play.date/dev/
Game Controls:
  • D-pad to move
  • A button to undo your last move (up to 30 undos)
  • B button to bring up the in-game menu

Bug reports, questions, feedback, etc. are all welcome in the comments thread below, or feel free to message me on Twitter.

Made for Playdate, using Pulp!
